trans-unit.resname: SS3·1 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each opponent.

trans-unit.resname: SS3·1 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 2
SS3·1 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: [−3]: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: [−3]: CARDNAME deals 4 damage to target creature.

trans-unit.resname: SS3·1 | Chandra, Torch of Defiance | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."
trans-unit.target: [−7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."

trans-unit.resname: SS3·4 | Past in Flames | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Past in Flames
trans-unit.target: Past in Flames

trans-unit.resname: SS3·4 | Past in Flames | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost.

trans-unit.resname: SS3·4 | Past in Flames | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

trans-unit.resname: SS3·6 | Pyromancer Ascension | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pyromancer Ascension
trans-unit.target: Pyromancer Ascension

trans-unit.resname: SS3·6 | Pyromancer Ascension | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on CARDNAME.

trans-unit.resname: SS3·6 | Pyromancer Ascension | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while CARDNAME has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while CARDNAME has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

trans-unit.target: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named CARDNAME in each graveyard.
